EmailTemplate.name: App demo requst
EmailTemplate.subject: Exciting new app for your Treatment Center
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
We're proud to be rolling out a treatment center app which is compatible with Salesforce. We are getting close to having the demo product ready and would love the chance to show it off. I'm reaching out to see if you have any interest in the roll out so I can set up time to demo the product to you. It will feature...
Availability projections- you will know exactly how many beds available and on what date Sober living collections tools- Know who is paid on rent and what the balance may be. Client fund tools- No more fumbling receipts and carrying around clients credit cards or cash. Alumni surveys- Call logs generated from app using predictive model based on risk factors from survey.
We are also a Full Service Salesforce Partner. Let me know I could send an eBook explaining our services for treatment centers.
Regards,
Matt Falkner Mirketa Inc | Think. Build. Transform Phone: 772-932-1623 matt.falkner@mirketa.com
